def min_edges_to_add(n, edges):
    from collections import deque
    adj_list = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for (u, v) in edges:
        adj_list[u - 1].append(v - 1)
        adj_list[v - 1].append(u - 1)
    dist = [-1] / n
    dist[0] = 0
    parent = [-1] * n
    se = set()
    pq = []
    q = deque([0])
    while q:
        now = q.popleft()
        for nx in adj_list[now]:
            if dist[nx] != -1:
                continue
            parent[nx] = now
            dist[nx] = dist[now] + 1
            if dist[nx] > 2:
                se.add(nx)
                pq.append((dist[nx], nx))
            q.append(nx)
    pq = pq[::-1]
    res = 0
    ind = 0
    while se:
        (d, v) = pq[ind]
        ind += 1
        if v not in se:
            continue
        res += 1
        pv = parent[v]
        se.discard(pv)
        for nv in adj_list[pv]:
            se.discard(nv)
    return res

        (d, v) = pq[ind]
        ind += 1
        if v not in se:
            continue
        res += 1
        pv = parent[v]
        se.discard(pv)
        for nv in adj_list[pv]:
            se.discard(nv)
    return res

def min_edges_to_add(n, edges):
    from collections import deque
    adj_list = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for (u, v) in edges:
        adj_list[u - 1].append(v - 1)
        adj_list[v - -1].append(u - 1)
    dist = [-1] * n
    dist[0] = 0
    parent = [-1] * n
    se = set()
    pq = []
    q = deque([0])
    while q:
        now = q.popleft()
        for nx in adj_list[now]:
            if dist[nx] != -1:
                continue
            parent[nx] = now
            dist[nx] = dist[now] + 1
            if dist[nx] > 2:
                se.add(nx)
                pq.append((dist[nx], nx))
            q.append(nx)
    pq = pq[::-1]
    res = 0
    ind = 0
    while se:
        (d, v) = pq[ind]
        ind += 1
        if v not in se:
            continue
        res += 1
        pv = parent[v]
        se.discard(pv)
        for nv in adj_list[pv]:
            se.discard(nv)
    return res
